WorkItem.Description:
Rawr still select a chaotic shadow-spirit diamond for moonkin even when I do not have it select as being available.  This of course causes all other items to be gummed differently.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
 
   1. Launch Rawr
   2. Select GEMS:Meta from the filter
   3. Observe that chaotic shadow-spirit diamond is not selected and the only available meta is ember shadow-spirit diamond.
   4. Select tools - optimizer
   5. adjust thoroughness to full
   6. notice that the resultant set has picked and gemmed for a chaotic shadow-spirit diamond.
 
Additional Information:
 
    * Rawr v4.0.13b
    * Windows 7 RTM
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Still using meta gem not selected as available

Comments.Message: I suppose I should mention this is using the in browser version running ie8.
annubiz, you likely will have to uncheck the item called "Consider Gems in Enabled Gemming Templates to be available" on the Options menu.
Not a bug. You have the metagem in question considered available through gemming templates.
oh new functionality well color me special.... thanks folk
